description: The name and optionally the selector for a metric

name.description: The name of the given metric. The name cannot be '`.`' or '`..`' and it cannot contain '`/`' or '`%`'.

selector.description: The string-encoded form of a standard kubernetes label selector for the given metric. When set, it is passed as an additional parameter to the metrics server for more specific metrics scoping. When unset, just the `name` will be used to gather metrics.
